description:
Discover the ‘BETTER YOU’ with The BML Fitness 9 week online program!

The BML 9 Week Challenge is for anyone looking to overcome a lack of motivation in order to reinvigorate their lives by building healthy exercise and nutrition habits. Whether you have zero experience or plenty of experience with exercising and/or eating well, BML’s three pronged approach, where members will BUILD healthy habits, MAINTAIN them and finally LIVE them, will help you to become the best version of yourself.

You’ll practice quality workouts combined with the best nutrition plan for you, underpinned by consistent motivation which drives life-changing results. By purchasing the BML Fitness program, you will be taking the first step towards a more invigorating life. Your energy levels will increase, your thinking will become more positive and body will beam from the renewed habit’s you have cultivated.

  • More Than 50 Emails Delivered Over 9 Weeks!
  • Quick & Easy Video Tips From Our 5 Resident Experts
  • Flexible Exercise & Nutrition Programs Fit With Your Plans... Not Ours
  • Innovative Motivation & Lifestyle Programs Designed to Keep You on Track!
title: BML Fitness 9 Week Challenge
instructors: Matt Williams, Jess Moulds, Paul Stead, Anthony Patrickson, Cassandra Brewer
